data.title: Turnkey Africa awarded Partner of the Year for Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
data.meta_description: Turnkey Africa Ltd has won the Year 2019 Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Partner Award for being the Pioneers in Providing Enterprise Cloud Platforms to the…
data.text:
Turnkey Africa Ltd has won the Year 2019 Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Partner Award for being the Pioneers in Providing Enterprise Cloud Platforms to the Insurance Sector in Kenya and the larger East Africa region.

A leading Pan-African software solutions firm, Turnkey provides solutions to the African Insurance and banking industries. It was named the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Partner of the Year – Kenya and East Africa – at this year’s Oracle Partner Award Ceremony, for successfully enabling its clients including a leading global insurer on their Cloud journey.

“Through our flagship solution – TurnQuest Insurance Suite – Turnkey is enabling its clients’ digital transformation utilizing Oracle’s core technologies,” said Shikoli Makatiani, Turnkey’s Chief Technology Officer (CTO).

Shikoli further noted that TurnQuest offers a quick and painless path to digital insurance by enhancing channels and customer engagement and reducing quote to bind time alongside improving KYC. It also provides a single platform for the entire operations and reducing the solution footprint.

The Partner of the Year awards are part of the Oracle Excellence Awards, which recognizes the Oracle partners’ commitment to delivering innovative solutions and business achievements. Turnkey Africa, which has been an Oracle partner for the over 20 years, has put a great amount of work and effort in building best-in-class solutions to enable clients realize benefits and efficiencies.

“We believe that technology will transform insurance, and we are at the forefront of that change across Africa,” said Kizito Makatiani the CEO at Turnkey. “This award is a testament to Turnkey Africa’s dedication to building and delivering connected technologies that help the best run insurers adapt, evolve and win and becoming a partner of choice to the insurance industry.”

.
